text: Sergei Mikhailovich Makarov (; born 19 June 1958 in Chelyabinsk, Soviet Union) is a Russian former ice hockey right wing. He was a two-time Olympic gold medalist. He was voted one of six players to the International Ice Hockey Federation's (IIHF) Centennial All-Star Team.IIHF Centennial All-Star Team This was in a poll conducted by a group of 56 experts from 16 countries. == References == Category:1958 births Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Russian ice hockey right wingers Category:People from Chelyabinsk Oblast
title: Sergei Makarov
